LandingPage.mainHeading: Apne Safar ko Taqatwar Banayein. Sath Mil Kar.
LandingPage.subHeading: FEMMORA khawateen ke liye jurrne, baat cheet karne aur taraqqi karne ki ek panahgah hai. Aap ke liye banai gayi jagah mein behtari, takhleeqi salahiyat aur community ko explore karein.
LandingPage.thriveParagraph: FEMMORA mein, hum ijtemai taqat par yaqeen rakhte hain. Hamara platform sirf ek app nahi hai; yeh har aurat ki behtari aur kamyabi ke munfarid safar ka jashn manane aur uski himayat karne ke liye ek tehreek hai.
LandingPage.featuresHeading: Aap Ke Liye Banai Gayi Khususiyat
LandingPage.featuresSubHeading: Aap ko apni zaati aur peshawarana taraqqi ke liye jis cheez ki zaroorat hai, sab ek jagah par.
LandingPage.featureSoulSpaceDescription: Ek mehfooz digital panahgah jahan jazbaat ko hamdardi se milaya jata hai. Chahe aap maghloob hon, ghaur-o-fikr kar rahe hon, ya shifayab ho rahe hon, SoulSpace sunta hai - rehnumai par mabni akasi, narm isharay, aur muawin AI sathi paish karta hai jo aap ke dil ki zaban bolte hain.
LandingPage.featureHerHealthDescription: Ek pursukoon jagah par apne cycles, neend aur tanav ko track karein. HerHealth aap ko samajhne ke liye anukooli AI ka istemal karta hai - tarz-e-zindagi mein tabdeeliyan, yadehanian, aur muawin mamoolat ki sifarish karta hai jo aap ke jism ki taal ka ehtiram karte hain.
LandingPage.featureNourishTitle: Nourish: Zati Ghiza aur Ghizaiyat Guide
LandingPage.featureNourishDescription: Har aurat ke safar ke liye banaya gaya - taqat se khud ki dekhbhal tak. Nourish khane ki tajaveez paish karta hai jo aap ke mizaj, sehat ke ahdaf aur saqafat se mail khati hain. Har sifarish mohabbat ki jagah se aati hai, pabandi se nahi.
LandingPage.featureEvolveTitle: Evolve: Narm Fitness aur Tawanai ka Bahao
LandingPage.featureEvolveDescription: Apni raftaar se aage barhein - yoga, zehni harkat, aur khawateen par markooz warzishein jo aap ki tawanai ki satah aur jazbati halat se rehnumai karti hain. Evolve mein har harkat is baat ka jashn manati hai ke aap ka jism kya kar sakta hai, na ke usey kya karna chahiye.
LandingPage.featureCircleDescription: Khawateen ke liye rabta qaim karne, kahaniyan bantne aur ek doosre ko uthane ke liye ek khoobsurti se mo'tadil jagah. Rozana check-in se le kar takhleeqi challenges tak, Circle baghair kisi mawazne ke ittehad ka jashn manata hai - taqat ki ek digital behn.
LandingPage.featureFEMMindTitle: FEMMind: Aap ka AI-Guided Growth Partner
LandingPage.featureFEMMindDescription: Teen theek-tuned, hamdard LLMs - sehat, jazbati tandurusti, aur zindagi ki rehnumai ki himayat ke liye apni marzi ke mutabiq. Woh sirf jawab nahi dete - woh samajhte hain, science ko hamdardi ke sath mila kar mashwara paish karte hain jo upar uthata hai, hidayat nahi deta.

logoutSuccess.title: Logged Out
logoutSuccess.description: Aap kamyabi se logout ho gaye hain.

logoutError.title: Uh oh!
logoutError.description: Aap ko logout nahi kiya ja saka. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.

LoginPage.title: Wapsi par Khushamdeed

error.title: Uh oh! Kuch ghalat ho gaya.
error.description: Ghalat email ya password. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.

SignupPage.title: FEMMORA Mein Shamil Hon
SignupPage.description: Apna account banayein aur apni taqatwari ka safar shuru karein.

success.title: Account Ban Gaya!
success.description: FEMMORA mein khushamdeed! Humein bohat khushi hai ke aap yahan hain ðŸ’œ

error.title: Signup Nakam
error.description: Aapka account banane mein masla hua. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.
error.emailInUse: Yeh email pehle se istemal mein hai. Barah-e-karam login karein.

EditProfileDialog.title: Profile Edit Karein
EditProfileDialog.description: Apni profile mein tabdeeliyan yahan karein. Jab ho jaye to save par click karein.
EditProfileDialog.bioPlaceholder: Humein apne baray mein kuch batayein

avatarError.title: Upload nakam
avatarError.description: Aapka naya avatar upload karne mein masla hua. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.

profileSuccess.title: Profile Update Ho Gayi!
profileSuccess.description: Aapki tabdeeliyan kamyabi se save ho gayi hain.

profileError.title: Update nakam
profileError.description: Aapki profile save karne mein masla hua. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.

placeholders.health: Maslan, Main ghar par ek aasan warzish ka routine kaise shuru kar sakta hoon?
placeholders.emotionalWellbeing: Maslan, Main stress mehsoos kar raha hoon, koi fori mindfulness tips?
placeholders.nutrition: Maslan, Kuch sehatmand snack ke ideas kya hain?

initialMessages.health: Hi! Main aapka Healthcare assistant hoon. Main aaj aapki kaise madad kar sakta hoon?
initialMessages.emotionalWellbeing: Hello, Main yahan aapki jazbati behtari ke liye hoon. Aapke zehen mein kya hai?
initialMessages.nutrition: Hey! Main aapka Diet guide hoon. Sehatmand khane ke baray mein kuch bhi poochein!

ChatInterface.errorMessage: Maaf kijiyega, kuch ghalat ho gaya. Barah-e-karam baad mein dobara koshish karein.

DietPage.title: Diet AI
DietPage.description: Ghizaiyat aur sehatmand khane ke liye aapka zaati rehnuma.

EmotionalHealthPage.title: Jazbati Sehat AI
EmotionalHealthPage.description: Mindfulness aur jazbati tawazun ke liye aapka zaati rehnuma.

HealthcarePage.title: Healthcare AI
